name: Fruit Shooter:Mercenary Relaxi
description:
Fruit Shooter:Mercenary Relaxing is one of the best and latest fruit shooting games with gun.
Aim,shoot fruits, watermelon and be a best fruit hunter in this new fruits shoot game
Features:
Realistic crushing and smashing levels
FPS gameplay with a lot of modern weapons
Frontier missions and sniper shoot challenge
Watermelon 3d games for free
Offline shooting games beautiful environment
